subject: Re: testing depending on perl in Samba 3?
body:
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Jeremy Allison wrote:

>> However, it would be necessary to depend on perl in Samba 3 for 'make
>> test' to run. Is that a problem?
> 
> Not a problem at all (at least to me :-) - thanks !

Let's try this in SAMBA_3_0 and early in the SAMBA_3_0_26 tree
and see how well things go.






jerry
